TABLE.NAME: nextblocks
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the nextblocks activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: iseval
FIELD.COMMENT: Boolean value, for indicating whether the exercise is for evaluation purposes. 0 is False (not for evaluation), anything else is True.

FIELD.NAME: testsfilehash
FIELD.COMMENT: Hash of the path to the tests file, if there is one for this exercise.

FIELD.NAME: nextblocksid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the instance of nextblocks for which data in this table is saved.

FIELD.NAME: saved_workspace
FIELD.COMMENT: State of the workspace when user clicks Save. Used for future restoration of user progress in the exercise.

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: Id of the user in mdl_user table.

TABLE.NAME: nextblocks_customblocks
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores definitions and generators of custom blocks defined in the interface.

FIELD.NAME: blockgenerator
FIELD.COMMENT: Code generator for the custom block

FIELD.NAME: nextblocksid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the exercise to which this custom block belongs

KEY.NAME: nextblocksid
KEY.COMMENT: Id of the exercise to which this custom block belongs
